overview: Only Cosco could bring you the man of the year. Mike Morris, coverman, former Colt man and the new Mr. CMC in San Francisco. We asked Mike to name any man he would like to be with for this film and he chose, with all of our blessings, Dave Daniels. Dave is all pro. Star of Morning, Noon and Night he quickly shows us how he earned his reputation. Lip service and Greek tongue come naturally to him. This film was photographed exclusively for Cosco by world-famous director and star Fred Halsted.
title: Desert Fox
